background_story:
Sharon Galmondis was born into a traditional family of wizards in the Forgotten Realms. From a young age, she was fascinated by the magic of her parents and the stories of the world they came from. When she was old enough, she began to study magic herself, determined to become the greatest wizard in the world.

However, as she studied, she realized that the world was much larger and more complicated than she had thought. There were so many different ways to use magic, and she became more and more interested in the different ways people used it.

Eventually, she realized that she didn't want to be a wizard like her parents. She wanted to be something new, something that no one had ever seen before. And so she became a sage cleric, using her knowledge of magic to help others and make the world a better place.

background_story:
Lyda Sylineth was born into a family of con artists and thieves. Her parents taught her everything they knew about deception and how to take advantage of others. She grew up on the streets, using her skills to survive. When she was old enough, she joined her parents in their criminal activities.

She quickly learned that she had a talent for trickery and deception. She could talk her way out of any situation and convince people to give her what she wanted. She enjoyed the thrill of the con and the challenge of duping her victims.

As she grew older, she realized that she could use her talents for good as well as for evil. She could help people by using her skills to deceive those who would do them harm. She could also use her skills to help her family and friends get what they wanted.

Lyda Sylineth is a charlatan rogue who uses her skills to help others. She is a skilled deceiver

When she was sixteen, she left her tribe to find her own way in the world. She quickly realized that she loved adventure and archaeology.
